title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response includes only two of the following.

  • Correct axes and labeling on the graph

  • Correctly plotted means on the graph

  • Correctly plotted error bars on the graph

  • The determination that, based on the overlap of error bars, there is no statistical difference
